content: HDV Drop-in anchor Economical manual-set drop-in anchor ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Internally threaded drop-in anchor for medium load range applications Anchor, setting tool and Hilti drill bit form a matched tolerance system for reliable fastening Easy to read brand and size identification Applications Hanging threaded rods Plumbing Heating Installing ventilation and air-conditioning Suspending pipe ### TECHNICAL DATA: Environmental conditions: Dry indoor Approvals / Test reports: FM (Factory Mutual), UL (Underwriter Laboratories) Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Technical Data | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor | Approvals / Test reports | FM (Factory Mutual), UL (Underwriter Laboratories) | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Base materials | Concrete (lightweight), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck), Concrete (uncracked) | PROFIS Software | No ### ITEMS- 2207574 -
